authentication.beginCreateFirstUser: To begin, create your first user.
authentication.checkYourEmailForPasswordReset: Check your email for a link that will allow you to securely reset your password.
authentication.emailNotValid: The email provided is not valid
authentication.forgotPasswordEmailInstructions: Please enter your email below. You will receive an email message with instructions on how to reset your password.
authentication.generatingNewAPIKeyWillInvalidate: Generating a new API key will <1>invalidate</1> the previous key. Are you sure you wish to continue?
authentication.loggedIn: To log in with another user, you should <0>log out</0> first.
authentication.loggedInChangePassword: To change your password, go to your <0>account</0> and edit your password there.
authentication.loggedOutInactivity: You have been logged out due to inactivity.
authentication.loggedOutSuccessfully: You have been logged out successfully.
authentication.loginWithAnotherUser: To log in with another user, you should <0>log out</0> first.
authentication.newAccountCreated:
A new account has just been created for you to access {{serverURL}} Please click on the following link or paste the URL below into your browser to verify your email: {{verificationURL}}
After verifying your email, you will be able to log in successfully.
authentication.youAreInactive: You haven't been active in a little while and will shortly be automatically logged out for your own security. Would you like to stay logged in?
authentication.youAreReceivingResetPassword: You are receiving this because you (or someone else) have requested the reset of the password for your account. Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to complete the process:
authentication.youDidNotRequestPassword: If you did not request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

error.accountAlreadyActivated: This account has already been activated.
error.autosaving: There was a problem while autosaving this document.
error.deletingFile: There was an error deleting file.
error.deletingTitle: There was an error while deleting {{title}}. Please check your connection and try again.
error.emailOrPasswordIncorrect: The email or password provided is incorrect.
error.loadingDocument: There was a problem loading the document with ID of {{id}}.
error.missingIDOfDocument: Missing ID of document to update.
error.notAllowedToAccessPage: You are not allowed to access this page.

error.problemUploadingFile: There was a problem while uploading the file.
error.tokenInvalidOrExpired: Token is either invalid or has expired.
error.unPublishingDocument: There was a problem while un-publishing this document.
error.unauthorized: Unauthorized, you must be logged in to make this request.
error.userLocked: This user is locked due to having too many failed login attempts.
